text: Vony radyty vy; skazhit聞, "BOH radyt聞 vam shchodo yedynoyi osoby. Yakshcho kozhnyy vmyraye ta lyshaye niyakykh ditey, ta vin ne mav sestru, vona otrymuye polovynu spadkovist聞. Yakshcho vona vmyraye spochatku, vin uspadkovuye z yiyi, yakshcho vona ne lyshala ditey. Yakshcho tam buly dva sester, vony pryyizhdzhayut聞 dva-thirds spadkovosti. Yakshcho siblings lyudy ta zhinky, muzhchyna pryyizhdzhaye dvichi aktsiya zhinky." BOH takym chynom roz'yasnyaye dlya vas, lest vy zablukayetesya. BOH znaye tsilkom vsi rechi
